headline: GRANVILLE PHILLIPS DUAL ION / FIVE THERMOCOUPLE GAUGE CONTROLLER
description: Dual Ion/ Five Thermocouple Gauge Controller    Granville Phillips 307089
specstable:
Manufacturer Granville Phil
Model 307089
Description Dual Ion/Five Thermocouple Gauge Controller/Process
Gauge Types Controlled Ion; Thermocouple
Cables Included No
Accessories


Power Supply (not shown) with interconnect cable.

Gauges and cables are not included, inquire, please.

TC gauge compatible types: G-P 270006, Comptech TVT-6000, or Teledyne-Hastings DV-6M, DV-6R, DV-36, DV-20.


Ion gauge cables see items 6799 or 17952

Other Information

More information can be found in the manual
Granville Phillips 307 Ion Gauge Controller Manual

307015 standard non-UHV electrometer
307005 resistive degas option
307006 option for sequential operation of second ion gauge
307014, 307059, 307060 modules for the total of five thermocouple gauges readout, pressure range 10-3 Torr to 1 Torr Nitrogen or air equivalent.

307082 two channel set point process control module (TC channels 3 and 5), can be upgraded to 6 channels for $150

307019 RS232 communications module optional, add $200

Optional I/O connector, if available, add $100

Can be converted to 230VAC operation, request when ordering

Dimensions and weight:

Control Unit

  • Width 241 mm 9.5 in
  • Height 89 mm (3.5 in.)
  • Depth 356 mm (14 in.) includes 76 mm (3 in.) for connectors and cables
  • Weight 3 kg (6.5 lb.)


Power Unit

  • Width 203 mm (8 in.)
  • Height 89 mm (3.5 in.)
  • Depth 330 mm (13 in.) includes 89 mm (3.5 in.) for connectors and cables
  • Weight 4 kg (8.5 lb.)

Power Requirements 115 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
